blog.title: Easy Crockpot Carnitas
blog.description: These are the easiest crockpot carnitas and simple enough for anyone to make! Juicy, flavorful, and perfectly browned with a crispy crust.

blog.title: Vegan Crunchwrap Supreme
blog.description: These Vegan Crunchwraps are so easy and delicious, even my carnivore hubby loves these! I will definitely be making these for my family regularly! Thank you for the recipe!!!

blog.title: test
blog.description: Very good, healthy, and quick recipe! Thank you. I added red peppers for color and another vegetable. I will definitely be making this again.

blog.title: Basic + Awesome Vegetarian Lasagna
blog.description: The very best Vegetarian Lasagna! Walnuts, zucchini, carrots, onions, and mushrooms blitzed up into a meat-like texture that gets layered with lots of cheese and sauce. Cozy + nourishing!

blog.title: Quick Homemade Ramen
blog.description: Take the usual ramen up a notch with this quick homemade ramen. Fresh veggies and herbs make this extra delicious, healthy, and cozy!
